info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 02 at 1:57PM PDT until September 02 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Central Clark County in southern Nevada... * Until 500 PM PDT. * At 157 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the Las Vegas Valley. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Las Vegas, Henderson, North Las Vegas, East Las Vegas, Nellis AFB, Downtown Las Vegas, The Motor Speedway, Sam Boyd Stadium, The Strip, Paradise, Green Valley, Aliante, Lake Las Vegas, Spring Valley, Las Vegas Bay, Enterprise, Lone Mountain, Southern Highlands, Centennial Hills and Summerlin. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
